channel.title: Two Questions

item.title: Two Questions
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

  1. How would I make an npcs respawn time take longer? I tried doing something like this in npc.cfg
npc = 1158	Kalphite_Queen			333	400	130

As you can see, I added the 3rd number, 130. This did not change anything. So any help?

  1. What code do I add to this so that this case would actually work? I want to use an item on an npc, which is case 57, but I have no idea on the code to add.

[code] case 57: // Use item on npc
int readone = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int readtwo = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int readthree = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int readfour = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

        System.out.println("1 = " + readone);
        System.out.println("2 = " + readtwo);
        System.out.println("3 = " + readthree);
        System.out.println("4 = " + readfour);
        break;[/code]

Read full topic
